title: Development of Teacher Coaching Session Frameworks: Facilitating Interactive Dialogue and Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary education curriculum design and Project-Based Learning (PBL) experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative and analytical tool-enabled environment using digital devices (tablets, laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can explain systematic methods for analyzing dialogic interactions in teacher coaching sessions
Learners can apply methods to visually represent the learning design development process and derive outcomes from coaching sessions
Learners can discuss improvements to learning activities designed in coaching sessions and provide peer feedback

resources: T-SEDA (Teacher- Student Exchange and Dialogic Analysis) Coding Framework Tool

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
